```{r, out.width="800px", warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(pdftools)
library(tools)
tools::texi2dvi(file = "cong-thuc-phuong-sai_2.tex", pdf = TRUE, clean = FALSE)

pdftools::pdf_render_page("cong-thuc-phuong-sai_2.pdf", dpi = 300) -> bitmap
png::writePNG(bitmap, "cong-thuc-phuong-sai_2.png")
knitr::include_graphics("cong-thuc-phuong-sai_2.png")
```
